File 'base/atexit.tcl' (part of 'Pool_Base')

Home | Packages | Files | Procedures | Classes | Namespaces | Keywords | External packages

Description (short)
Hooking into exit
Written by
Andreas Kupries
Description
Specify scripts to evaluate just before terminating the application. This provides a hook into exit processing.
Depends on
Tcl
Keywords
atexit, exit hook, script termination
  • ::pool::atexit::add (script)
  • ::pool::atexit::do ()

::pool::atexit::add (script)
Remember the script for evaluation upon exit.
Argument: script code to evaluate upon exit.

::pool::atexit::do ()
Execute all remembered scripts.
